name: Introduction to Neuroscience
description: An introductory course to neuroscience, focusing on the fundamentals of neuroscience.

name: Neuroimaging: Fundamentals and Techniques
description: A course focusing on the fundamentals of neuroimaging techniques, including Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI), Positron Emission Tomography (PET), and Single Photon Emission Computed Tomography (SPECT).

name: Advanced Neuroimaging Techniques
description: A course focusing on advanced techniques in neuroimaging, including diffusion MRI, functional MRI, and magnetoencephalography.
